ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has seen significant activity, with multiple pull requests submitted on December 26, 2024. These include updates to the 'Midnight Moment Art Contest: Voting Open' news post, the 'Medals/Unlock requirements/Dedication' section, and the 'Help centre/Account restrictions' article. Additionally, an expansion of the Difficulty Reduction mod articles has been proposed, along with updates to the Indonesian and Spanish translations.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has experienced substantial activity, with several pull requests submitted on December 26, 2024. These include efforts to enhance the beatmap editing flow by adding an audio tab, changes to the hit leniency in the OsuModRelax mod to match the stable version, and a proposal to improve osu!taiko pooling, which involves splitting the 'Hit' class into 'HitCentre' and 'HitRim' classes to facilitate pooling, although help is needed to address certain issues and uncertainties in the implementation.
